solution_line_template: As the daily goal is {daily_recommended_vitamin_a}mg and there are {days_in_week} days in a week, this means Ryan needs to take {days_in_week}*{daily_recommended_vitamin_a}=<<{daily_recommended_vitamin_a}*{days_in_week}={weekly_recommended_vitamin_a}>>{weekly_recommended_vitamin_a}mg in a week.

As there is {mg_per_pill}mg per pill, this means Ryan needs to take {weekly_recommended_vitamin_a}/{mg_per_pill}= <<{weekly_recommended_vitamin_a}/{mg_per_pill}={pills_needed_weekly}>>{pills_needed_weekly} pills every week.
